name: Calcosa CC
about: At Calcosa CC flying school, we offer a comprehensive Aviation Technology program designed to prepare students for exciting careers in aviation. Our courses provide a solid foundation in aerodynamics, airplane system knowledge, navigation, meteorology, and Federal Aviation regulations. Students can earn an FAA commercial pilot single/multiengine land license with an instrument rating, and our Aviation Management program prepares students for careers in marketing, sales, and airline operations. We utilize FAA-certified Advanced Aviation Training Devices for realistic and cost-effective training. With experienced instructors and a hands-on approach, our students are well-equipped to enter the aviation industry immediately upon graduation. Our programs are tailored to help students achieve their aviation goals efficiently and safely.
